title: AppleCare BPR Global Change Lead
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, phenomenal new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish! We are seeking an expert Change Lead to take on a multi-year initiative. We feature an environment with creative, inquisitive people and groundbreaking technologies. Join us and make a difference! The successful candidate will serve as a Change Lead for a large, cross-functional initiative, on the Global Planning, Portfolio and Change (PPC) team. This individual will be responsible for delivering change management on large, cross-functional system/process implementations and providing change management training, tools, templates and support to our internal BPR Project Managers. In this role you will partner with AppleCare project and functional teams based in the US, EMEIA and APAC to help support the roll out of a multi-year program.
description: You will deliver change management on a large, cross-functional initiative, including partner analysis, change impact analysis, and communications and training plans. Implement and deliver Apple-developed methodology and templates acting as a reference point for queries and information Earn respect and trust of AppleCare partners, soliciting action in a fast-paced environment Maintain and update change management framework and templates Work independently while providing visibility and status reporting to project team, change management team and leadership
preferred_qualifications: PROSCI (or equivalent industry leader in Change Management) certification, Passion and knowledge in AI/ML is a plus, Masters or MBA is a plus
